summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight pH deviation and temperature drop.

insights.recommendation: Monitor pH closely; maintain between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal tilapia health.
Continue monitoring; TDS is within acceptable range for both fish and plants.
Consider heating if temperatures drop further; optimal range is 26-30°C for tilapia.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.043 / 7.021 / 7.08 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 310.91 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.841 / 25.94 / 30.06 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
